## Repository Information

**Repository:** eivindml/awesome-productivity
**URL:** https://github.com/eivindml/awesome-productivity
**Category/Focus:** Productivity resources - works if pitched as "PM productivity + decision-making skills system"

## Submission Details

### Target Audience
Professionals seeking productivity tools, methods, and resources to work more effectively.

### Positioning/Pitch
PM-Skills is a productivity multiplier for product teams: instantly generate professional artifacts that typically take hours, using AI-powered workflows and proven frameworks.

### Relevant Section
Likely sections:
- "Tools"
- "Productivity Software"
- "Workflow Automation"
- "AI Tools" if exists
- "Professional Development"

### Submission Content

**Title/Name:**
```
PM-Skills
```

**Description:**
```markdown
AI-powered productivity system for product teams. 24 workflows that transform hours of work into minutes: PRDs, user stories, hypotheses, experiments, retrospectives, and stakeholder analyses. Professional frameworks (Triple Diamond, JTBD, OST) automated via AI assistants. Works with Claude, GitHub Copilot, Cursor.
```

**Link:**
```
https://github.com/product-on-purpose/pm-skills
```

**Productivity-focused angle:**
```markdown
PM productivity system: Generate in minutes what typically takes hours. 24 AI-powered workflows for PRDs, user stories, experiments, and retrospectives with professional quality. Proven frameworks automated for efficiency.
```

## Checklist

- [ ] Research repository structure and contribution guidelines

- [ ] Draft tailored submission emphasizing efficiency gains
- [ ] Check for existing pm-skills entry
- [ ] Submit PR following their contribution process
- [ ] Track submission status
- [ ] Update this issue with PR link
- [ ] Close when merged/accepted

## Notes

**Productivity angle:**
Frame pm-skills as **efficiency multiplier**, not just PM tool:

1. **Time savings** - hours â†’ minutes for PM artifacts
2. **Decision-making** - structured frameworks speed decisions
3. **Quality consistency** - professional output every time
4. **Workflow automation** - repeatable processes
5. **Context switching reduction** - integrated into AI assistants

**Emphasize:**
- Productivity gains (specific: "PRD in 5 minutes vs 2 hours")
- Automation of repetitive PM work
- Professional quality without the grind
- Focus on outcomes, not process

**Compare to:**
- Templates (but AI-powered)
- Consulting frameworks (but automated)
- PM tools (but integrated into workflow)

This is a good fit - productivity lists often include workflow automation and AI tools.
